snippet: Two men have pleaded guilty to conspiring to buy weapons illegally for what federal agents describe as a terrorist plot by a fringe militia group.
abstract: Fredrick Thomas and Dan Roberts plead guilty in federal district court in Georgia to charges of conspiring to buy weapons illegally for what is described as a terrorist plot by a fringe militia group.
lead_paragraph: Two men have pleaded guilty to conspiring to buy weapons illegally for what federal agents describe as a terrorist plot by a fringe militia group.

headline.main: Georgia: 2 Plead Guilty in Bomb Plot
headline.print_headline: Georgia: 2 Plead Guilty In Bomb Plot
